programme.title: Tariq El Ward
programme.desc: The series revolves around a young village woman who is fond of roses. When she faces a major problem that puts her in the center of family conflicts, she is forced to flee her village for the city in search of a better future, but her journey will be full of problems and difficulties.

programme.title: Bghit Hyatek
programme.desc: Three families have their lives turned upside down when they allow strangers to enter their world and destroy it.

programme.title: L'Maktoub
programme.desc: As a family seeks to keep its inheritance, its members decide to marry off Omar Al-Maatawi to his brother's wife after his death in order to achieve that end, but Omar's heart is attached to the girl Hind, who looks very similar to his deceased wife.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Kadin
programme.desc: Bahar meets Sarp on a ship , they fall in love and get married. Bahar gives birth to a girl named Nisan and a young boy, Doruk, but her life turns upside down when her husband disappears from their lives and she's forced to face life with her two children alone.

programme.title: El Fed TV 3
programme.desc: The sitcom presents a number of satirical segments that address, through various figures in Moroccan society, many social issues, in an attempt to present them in an interesting comedic way.

programme.title: Jib Darkoum
programme.desc: It follows the dentist Mohsen, who falls in love with a girl from a rich family, and since he is an orphan, he lies to her and introduces her to a fake family who proposes to her family. Hilarity ensues when he is forced to live with the lie during the dating period that will last a month under one roof.

programme.title: 2 Wjouh
programme.desc: The series takes place in the city of Casablanca and tells the story of one of the slums in which begging and poverty are widespread, through stories from the class that suffers in Moroccan society.

programme.title: ‏Bnat Lahdid‏
programme.desc: Fatima is a young woman from a poor environment, who is distinguished by her strength and determination in overcoming life's difficulties. She works in her father's profession of selling used car supplies, until she meets a rich man and tries to get closer to him and his family. However, Fatima gets into serious problems and conflicts afterwards.

programme.title: Larivaar Gurbani Santhiya
programme.desc: Santhiya is the correct pronunciation of Gurbani, taught in the manner of how our 10th King Sri Guru Gobind Singh Ji wanted us to read and pronounce the Holy Shabadh.

programme.title: Nitnem with Subtitles
programme.desc: Nit-Nem is actually a compound word. 'Nit' means daily, 'Nem' is the short form of 'Nieam' meaning rule or practice. The Nitnem bani's usually include the Panj bania.

programme.title: Ma Ekhtalafna
programme.desc: Through separate, connected episodes, the series addresses many contemporary social issues, such as corruption, unemployment, poverty, social relations, and others.

programme.title: Kasr Adm 2: Al Saradib
programme.desc: In the second season, Abu Rayyan returns with many secrets and cases, at the same time, Brigadier General Kanaan Al Sayegh is responsible for uncovering corruption cases and confronting their perpetrators.

programme.title: Nazeef Al Torab
programme.desc: In the town of Tal Al-Sabr, near the city of Nablus, Palestinian prisoner Bilal survives after escaping from the occupier, as his aunt Umm Askar saves him from a certain death. Bilal changes his name to Assif and the events go on.

programme.title: Ma Ekhtalafna
programme.desc: Through separate, connected episodes, the series addresses many contemporary social issues, such as corruption, unemployment, poverty, social relations, and others.

programme.title: Mamarr Amen
programme.desc: It focuses on the idea of ​​unity and solidarity within the Yemeni society in order to reach a safe passage away from problems and disputes.

programme.desc: It focuses on the idea of ​​unity and solidarity within the Yemeni society in order to reach a safe passage away from problems and disputes.

programme.desc: Through separate, connected episodes, the series addresses many contemporary social issues, such as corruption, unemployment, poverty, social relations, and others.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Chuck works at a large courier company, and is in love with his girlfriend, Kelly. He plans to propose to her on Christmas, but is required to go to Malaysia for an urgent work assignment. The plane he's on crashes on the way, leaving Chuck as the only survivor on a deserted island, where it is up to him to protect both his own body and his own mind, by holding on to dreams of getting back.

programme.title: Al Washm
programme.desc: The series takes place in an old Levantine neighborhood, where it showcases the intertwined human relationships of the neighborhood’s residents, and the overt and hidden conflicts that take place between them.

programme.title: Aghmed Aynayk
programme.desc: Zaid is a special needs child. Doctors diagnose his condition with being on the autism spectrum, so Mu’nis, his mother’s friend, takes care of him as he is affected by his psychological state, and tries to provide him with a stable and normal life.

programme.title: Al Sadeeqat
programme.desc: A businesswoman seeks to exploit some girls to achieve her personal interests by having them work as dancers and forcing them to do whatever she asks, whatever it is, and the stories of these women come across each other.

programme.title: Bayt Ahly
programme.desc: The events take place in the 1940s, after Nouri leaves prison, a major conflict arises between him and Abu Adnan, coinciding with the assassination of the doctor, Abdul Rahman Al Shahbandar.

programme.title: Mal El Qabban
programme.desc: The events of the series take place inside Al-Hal Market in Damascus, highlighting the conditions of the Syrians, through the story of the Noman Al Zeer family and the events and problems they are exposed to.

programme.title: Al Arabji 2
programme.desc: Events escalate in the second season of the series, and Abdou the coachman seeks revenge and retaliation against his enemies, especially Al Nashwati, who allied this time with Doria. On the other hand, Zumuruda, who fleed from cruelty and oppression, does not know which path her fate will take her.

programme.title: Kasr Adm 2: Al Saradib
programme.desc: In the second season, Abu Rayyan returns with many secrets and cases, at the same time, Brigadier General Kanaan Al Sayegh is responsible for uncovering corruption cases and confronting their perpetrators.

programme.title: Arees Taht Al Talab
programme.desc: The events revolve around a group of people searching for love and marriage, and going through different circumstances. Dana creates an association for dating and reconciliation of loved ones, and the events continue.

programme.title: Al Khataya
programme.desc: Through six groups of five episodes, the work tells six stories about people who make mistakes and continue to make mistakes, but they lead them towards the abyss, and they drag other people with them.

programme.desc: The events revolve around three Arab half-sisters, one Kuwaiti, one Egyptian, and the other Saudi. Their grandmother, Ghaneema, invites them after the death of their father, to stay with her for a year so that she chooses one of them as her heiress.

programme.title: Min Kothr Hobbi Lak
programme.desc: Inside the halls of a residential building, the residents of the building meet, and friendly relationships, marriages, and divorces arise between them. On the other hand, family problems, murders, and thefts occur, so the residents seek to intensify their efforts to solve such things.

programme.title: Yassin Abdul Malik
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around Yassin Abdul Malik and his family, with whom he goes through various events, as many secrets about his hidden life are revealed.

programme.title: Malaffat Mansiyya
programme.desc: The series addresses the problem of kidnapping children in the 1990s and the start of the millennium, and it reveals the mystery behind the disappearance of girls under strange circumstances.

programme.title: Blero'n Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd yn myd Blero heddiw tybed? What's happening in the world of Blero today?

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon yr Estrys a'r Mochyn fferm fydd yn cael y sylw. In this programme, it's the Ostrich and Pig that feature.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Penny wedi trefnu arddangosfa o luniau. Tybed beth fydd y beirniad yn ei feddwl o hunan bortreadau'r plant? Siôn gives the children chopped vegetables to make pizza self-portraits!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nôl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
programme.desc: Mae'r criw hwyliog yn stiwdio Stwnsh Sadwrn, gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! The crew are in the Stwnsh Sadwrn studio with games and the odd Stwnsh pie!

programme.title: Mike Phillips: Croeso i Dubai
programme.desc: Elinor Davies Farn o Aberystwyth sy'n lawnsio ei busnes cynnyrch gwallt yn un o westai mwya' moethus Dubai. Party princess Hanna searches for the perfect costume for a Dubai party. [SL]

programme.title: Mike Phillips: Croeso i Dubai - Season 1, Episode 2
Codi Pac
programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sydd yn 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru, a thref lan môr Dinbych-y-Pysgod sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. This week we discover what the town of Tenby has to offer. [SL]

programme.title: Codi Pac Dinbych y Pysgod - Season 4, Episode 2
Ffasiwn Drefn
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, cwpwrdd dillad Meinir Williams Jones o Ynys Môn sy'n cael ei drawsnewid. This week we'll be decluttering and transforming Meinir Williams Jones's wardrobe in Anglesey. [SL]

programme.title: Ffasiwn Drefn Meinir Williams Jones - Season 1, Episode 4
Teulu Shadog: Tymhorau'r Flwyddyn
programme.desc: Dechreuwn y gyfres yn y gwanwyn wrth i Gary a Meinir droi stoc y fferm allan ar borfa ffres mis Ebrill. After a long winter Gary and Meinir turn the farm animals out onto fresh spring grass. [SL]

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Tro hwn: daw draenog i'r practis, ymweliad â blaidd-gi, a galwad brys gan fod Teddy y ci wedi llyncu bachyn pysgota. This time: a hedgehog, a wolf dog & a dog that's swallowed a fish hook. [SL]

programme.title: Am Dro
programme.desc: Aiff Sara, Mohima, Liam a Huw â ni ar daith i Langollen, Llyn Ogwen, Machynlleth ac ardal Tyddewi. We journey to Llangollen, Llyn Ogwen, Machynlleth, and St Davids. [SL]

programme.title: Gwyliau Gartref
programme.desc: Pentref bywiog Betws-y-Coed yng nghalon Eryri yw'r lleoliad tro ma. Pa garfan fydd yn ennill? Two crews with two different budgets, but who will have the most fun? This time: Betws-y-Coed. [SL]

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Abbey a Danial o Bwllheli yw'r pâr hyfryd sy'n cael priodas am £5000 y tro ma! Abbey and Danial from Pwllheli are this week's lucky couple, and their friends and family are here to muck in. [SL]

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil Abbey & Danial - Season 1, Episode 1
Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Ffoaduriaid o'r Wcrain sy'n diolch i staff Gwersyll yr Urdd Llangrannog am eu cymorth wrth iddynt ymgartrefu yng Nghymru dros dro. This time, Ukrainian refugees say thank you with flowers. [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Heno fe fydd Elin Fflur yn Sgwrsio Dan y Lloer efo un o gerddorion enwoca' Cymru, Huw Chiswell. Tonight Elin Fflur will be chatting with one of Wales' most famous musicians, Huw Chiswell. [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer Huw Chiswell
Ralio+: Kenya
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau o drydedd rownd Pencampwriaeth Rali'r Byd - Rali Saffari Kenya. Croeswn fysedd i'r Cymro, Elfyn Evans. Highlights from the World Rally Championship Round 3: Kenya Safari Rally.

programme.title: Hen Dy Newydd
programme.desc: Yn y bennod hon, mae'r criw yn adnewyddu 3 ardal mewn cartref i gwpwl ifanc yng Nghaerfyrddin. This time, the crew transform 3 spaces in the home of a young couple in Carmarthen.

programme.title: Hen Dy Newydd Caerfyrddin - Season 2, Episode 5
Pêl-droed Rhyng: Cymru v Croatia
programme.desc: Cyfle i wylio gêm ragbrofol Ewro 2025 UEFA Cymru v Croatia a chwaraewyd ddoe. A chance to watch the UEFA EURO 2025 qualifying game Wales v Croatia, played yesterday on Stok Cae Ras, Wrexham.

programme.title: New: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Rygbi Ewrop: Gweilch v Sale
programme.desc: Gêm Cwpan Her Rygbi Ewrop rhwng y Gweilch a Sale. Cae Bragdy Dunraven. C/G 8.00yh. European Rugby Challenge Cup game: Ospreys v Sale Sharks. Dunraven Brewery Field, Bridgend. K/O 8.00pm.

programme.title: Guinness World Records Cymru 2024
programme.desc: Dilynwn yr ymdrechion i dorri recordiau Guinness World Records Cymru - monster trucks, Space Hoppers a Welshcakes diri! We follow attempts to break Guinness World Records in Wales for 2024.

programme.title: Curadur
programme.desc: Tumi Williams o'r band Afrocluster yw'r curadur, efo gwesteion yn cynnwys DJ Trishna Jaikara ac Adjua. A look at Tumi Williams AKA Skunkadelic as he begins his journey in the Welsh language.
